name: Slime Skies - Guide
subtitle: Automate the Skies
landing_text: Welcome to $(bold)Slime Skies/$, a SkyBlock modpack which mainly revolves around the $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/create)Create/$ mod, both to offer a unique beginning, as well as the potential for much automation.$(br2)This guide book will provide you with helpful starting tips and information on materials and machines.
